main.name: Sam Ayoub
main.description: Software Architect & Engineering Leader / Director-level Engineering Management / FinTech, AI & SaaS
main.bio: Innovative software architect and engineering leader with over 15 years of experience designing, scaling, and mentoring cross-functional teams across FinTech, AI, and SaaS industries. Expert in building high-performance API and cloud architectures on AWS, GCP, and Azure. Proven ability to lead large-scale digital transformations, optimize performance, and bridge business strategy with cutting-edge technology execution. Passionate about driving engineering excellence, fostering collaboration, and delivering scalable, secure, and user-centric systems.
main.contactmessage: Do not hesitate to contact me anytime

certs.title: API Design and Fundamentals of Google Cloud's Apigee API Platform (with Honors)
AWS Fundamentals: Migrating to the Cloud

resume.skillmessage: I focus on leading high-performing engineering organizations, modernizing platforms, and mentoring teams while keeping security, scalability, and user experience at the core of every decision.

education.description: Focused on leadership, organizational strategy, and technology-driven business transformation.
Emphasis on software engineering, distributed systems, and database design.

work.title: Software Architect Consultant
work.description: Leading enterprise-wide consulting for scalable API and cloud modernization initiatives across the FinTech platform. Advising on API governance, developer experience, and DevOps automation using GitLab CI/CD while partnering with leadership on hybrid AWS/Azure cloud migration strategies.

work.title: Senior Principal Software Architect
work.description: Architected and implemented scalable API frameworks, reducing operational downtime by 30%. Directed multi-functional teams through enterprise platform modernization and introduced API specification standards that improved internal and external developer collaboration.

work.title: Senior Lead Engineer
work.description: Oversaw architecture and DevOps automation for API-driven enterprise applications across AWS, GCP, and Azure. Directed cloud security and multi-tenant compliance programs while streamlining CI/CD pipelines to improve release efficiency by 35%.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Automated the development lifecycle with Jenkins and CircleCI, cutting manual deployment effort by 60%. Delivered scalable API integrations that supported accessibility innovations for visually impaired users and collaborated with Marketing on SEO initiatives that increased web traffic by 20%.

work.title: Senior Lead Developer
work.description: Led global development of the Outsell OSdata platform serving over 10 million companies with real-time analytics. Designed and deployed SSO authentication systems and coordinated remote engineering teams across time zones to consistently achieve on-time delivery.

objectives.name: Directing large-scale API and cloud modernization initiatives that improve scalability and time-to-market.
Leading cross-functional engineering teams across FinTech, AI, and SaaS products.
Championing modular UI/UX architecture and design systems for consistent, maintainable experiences.
Mentoring engineers into senior roles and fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and excellence.
Partnering with executive leadership to align technical roadmaps with product vision and regulatory strategy.
Driving DevOps, CI/CD, and automation practices that increase reliability and deployment frequency.
